attributes.action: Withdraw permission for the Tour De France to start in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As French rules prevent the Unibet team from competing in the Tour de France because French rules outlaw advertising by foreign gambling firms permission should be withdraw on the same grounds because the Tour is sponsored by France's horse betting monopoly. The logic being that if non French gamming companies can not sponsor teams that compete in France then anything sponsored by a French gaming company should not be permitted outside France.
